## useRouteAction() function

获取当前组件所在页面的路由动作

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function useRouteAction(callback?: (action: Action) => void): Action;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | (action: Action) =&gt; void | <i>(Optional)</i> 回调事件 |

<b>Returns:</b>

Action

"PUSH" \| "POP" \| "REPLACE"
